------------------

- switch more z3c.jsonrpc to p01.jsonrpc

------------------

- switch from z3c.jsonrpc to p01.jsonrpc

------------------

- bugfix: fix form submit for non JSONRPC requests.

- improve html cleanup method

- cleanup imports
